title: bia.network
author: bia.network
created_time: September 16, 2022, 03:30:44 AMLast edit: September 21, 2022, 09:41:22 AM by bia.network
content: About $HAOThe HAO token ($HAO) is the governance token of HistoryDAO.$HAO holders may:• Maintain their voting rights of treasury governance and future platform parameter adjustments• Raise funds to pay for juries to arbitrate disputes• Approve legal expenses • Reward weekly, monthly, and annual award-winner HistoryNFT selections• Adjust transactions fee rates for trades on the HistoryDAO marketplaceThe HAO token will launch in Q4 of 2022.ABOUT HistoryDAOHistoryDAO is a first-of-its-kind platform for minting, trading, and collecting HistoryNFTs. Mint a single moment by uploading headlines, articles, text, and images to forever enshrine significant moments in the annals of history. Issue an Initial NFT Offering (INO) to crowdfund your HistoryNFT Series as you track events, tournaments, competitions, elections, and more with your NFT series. DAO features like weekly and monthly awards via community voting, project governance, and HistoryNFT verifiability will truly democratize and decentralize history recording.Rules1-Mint NFT on HistoryDAO website2-Post the NFT on Twitter and @History_DAO3-you must choose BSC chain to Mint3-The content of MINT is not limited, as long as it is something you think is worth recording, you can record mint4-Every mint successful one nft gets 2 stakes, and there is a limit of 10 stakes per week5-Join Telegram group Here6-Join the NFT group Here7- Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the listing Campaign.8- You don't need KYC to participate in this campaign.9- 100,000  Tokens will be distributed among the 1000 users with the most stakes after the completion of the Bounty program in proportion to the number of points.How to Mint a HistoryNFT:How to join1-To participate Campaign fill up the form below:【 REGISTRATION FORM 】2-Submit a report in this formatSPREADSHEETQuoteCode:● BSC Address #shorts Report ●- Your Twitter link- A link to the screenshot (for each NFT)          NFT screenshots           1. URL LINK           2. URL LINK
